程序包 station

类 Station

  • java.lang.Object
    • station.Station
  • public class Station
extends java.lang.Object
    Station holds several slots where users can rend bikes.
    作者:
    Zhihao Li

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器 说明
      Station()
      special initialization grid size 4km * 4km , 10 *10 grid 0.4 probability of plus(chosen)
      Station​(boolean plus, int gridSize)
      general initialization
      Station​(int slotnum, double probaBike, double probaEBike)
      probability constructor

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Station

        public Station​(boolean plus,
               int gridSize)
        throws java.lang.Exception
        general initialization
        参数:
        plus - if it is a plus station
        gridSize - edge length of the grid
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - several exceptions to be solved

      • Station

        public Station​(int slotnum,
               double probaBike,
               double probaEBike)
        probability constructor
        参数:
        slotnum - total slot number
        probaBike - bike generating probability
        probaEBike - electric bike generating probability

      • Station

        public Station()
        special initialization grid size 4km * 4km , 10 *10 grid 0.4 probability of plus(chosen)

        public void delSlot​(Slot slot)
             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        参数:
        slot - the slot to be deleted
        抛出:
